mapper.select: SELECT zi.contractID, resCode AS workNo, resName AS workName, zi.spec, stockBillNo, zi.unit, qty, zt.price, zt.priceNoTax, (zt.price - zt.priceNoTax) AS tax, zt.contractSum, zt.contractSumNoTax, (zt.contractSum - zt.contractSumNoTax) as contractTax, zt.changeQty, zt.changePrice, zt.changePriceNoTax, (zt.changePrice - zt.changePriceNoTax) as changeTax, zt.changeContractSum, zt.changeContractSumNoTax, (zt.changeContractSum - zt.changeContractSumNoTax) as changeContractTax, thisQty, zt.price AS thisPrice, zt.priceNoTax as thisPriceNoTax, (zt.price - zt.priceNoTax) as thisTax, zi.thisAmt, zi.thisAmtNoTax, zi.thisAmtTax, qty as upQty, zt.price AS upPrice, zt.priceNoTax AS upPriceNoTax, (zt.price - zt.priceNoTax) AS upTax, zi.thisAmt AS upAmt, zi.thisAmtNoTax AS upAmtNoTax, zi.thisAmtTax AS upAmtTax, qty AS totalQty, zt.price AS totalPrice, zt.priceNoTax AS totalNoTax, (zt.price - zt.priceNoTax) AS totalTax, zi.thisAmt AS totalAmt, zi.thisAmtNoTax AS totalAmtNoTax, zi.thisAmtTax AS totalAmtTax, zi.taxRate, (SELECT isDeduct FROM zx_ct_supplies_shop_settlement_list WHERE del_flag = '0' and zx_ct_supplies_shop_settlement_id = zs.billID) AS isDeduct, zi.remarks AS remark FROM zx_ct_supplies_shop_res_settle_item zi left join zx_ct_supplies_shop_res_settle zs on zi.mainID = zs.zx_ct_supplies_shop_res_settle_id left join zx_ct_supplies_contr_shop_list zt on zi.resID = zt.zx_ct_supplies_contr_shop_list_id where zi.del_flag = '0' and zs.billID = #{zxCtSuppliesShopSettlementId,jdbcType=CHAR}
